body:
Dear Radiance colleagues,

For those of you who could not join us for the Radiance Workshop 2005 in
Montreal, you can now download all abstracts and presentations from the
workshop from http://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/ie/light/RadianceWorkshop2005/
<http://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/ie/light/RadianceWorkshop2005/> . Enjoy,

Christoph
Christoph Reinhart, Ph.D.
Associate Research Officer                      National Research
Council Canada         Institute for Research in Construction
Adjunct Professor                                    McGill University
School of Architecture
1200 Montreal Road M-24, Ottawa         Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada
tel: (613) 993-9703                                  fax: (613) 954 3733
christoph.reinhart@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
